metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6346 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
RESTEasy enables GZIPInterceptor, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6346` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libresteasy-java - 3.1.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: resteasy package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-1').
